tool_description: Tracks and analyzes domain registration history, ownership changes, and historical patterns for due diligence purposes.

domain_name.description: Domain name to track registration history

years_back.description: Number of years of history to retrieve

error_messages: Invalid domain name: Provide a valid registered domain name.
History unavailable: Historical data not available for this domain.
Invalid years_back: Must be between 1 and 20 years.
Database access error: Unable to access historical domain databases.
usage: Provide domain_name to retrieve registration history. Set years_back and include_ownership_changes to customize the historical analysis depth.

ownership_changes.description: Record of ownership/registrant changes over time

expired_periods.description: Periods when domain was expired or in redemption

risk_indicators.description: Potential risk indicators from historical patterns
